content.description: Many European countries provide families one or more of the following: tax credits, flexible parental leave, monthly payments, public-transportation fare reduction, free vaccines, and subsidized childcare.
content.question: Which of the following would explain why a country such as Belgium would implement the described policies?

choices.label: Belgium has concerns about gender equality and wants to increase female participation in the workforce.
Belgium has concerns about an aging population and wants to encourage higher birth rates.
Belgium has concerns about a large youth population and wants to encourage lower birth rates.
Belgium has concerns about the ability of immigrants from developing regions to support themselves.
Belgium has concerns about an aging population and wants to encourage lower birth rates.

content.answer: Belgium has concerns about an aging population and wants to encourage higher birth rates.
